data.text:
Devoted to Their Craft.

NBA officials do more than enforce the rule book. They uphold the integrity of world’s premier basketball league. 30 teams. 120 pre-season games. 1260 regular season games. 4 rounds of playoffs. Every 24 seconds. Every 48 minutes. Every overtime. Every game. These are the officials who oversee competition in real-time between ten exceptional athletes, making calls with 95% accuracy.
